thread.title: 'What became of the Britannia?'

title: 'What became of the Britannia?'
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Oct 9, 2015, 09:37 BST - UK Markets close in 6 hrs 53 mins 'What became of the Britannia?' By Jessica Gorst-Williams | Telegraph – 13 minutes ago -0.826 
A reader seeks help locating a lost bank account 
I have an old investment account with Britannia Building Society. The last transaction was in January 2007. Some time between then and now the society was taken over by another firm. I have tried to find out which one but so far I have had no success. RW, Co Down 
Britannia became part of Co-operative Bank in 2009. I spoke to the bank, which identified your account, and you now have the remaining balance. 
An internet search could have found out what you wanted to know. For those not able to contend with computers perhaps a friendly member of staff in a library with internet access could be inveigled to help. 
• Struggle to get 'dormant' funds from Barclays (Swiss: BARC.SW - news ) 
Other resources include the Building Societies Association (020 7520 5900; bsa.org.uk ). Scroll down the first page to find “Where is my old building society?” Old accounts may be located through mylostaccount.org.uk .
